name: Bone Bringer of Endless Hunts and Prey

description.value:
The deep savannahs are a cruel and unrelenting land of predators and prey. Survival is key, and none know that more than the various Gnoll packs that roam this plains of grass and feast on its bountiful harvests. The Bone Bringer's origin is unknown to outsiders due to the reputation some Gnolls carry for other ancestries.

To the Savannah Gnolls, the Bone Bringer is an ancient Gnoll huntress who embraced the wild nature of the Savahnnah to such a degree that she became part of it integrally. Keeping the balance and protecting the wild lands and those that roam within who have proven their devotion.


Edicts respect your ancestors, live for the pack, waste not energy on useless cruelty or mercy
Anathema waste food, take actions that harm the collective
Follower Alignments Any
